page.shortlink: api extension namespace uriquery class build uri query method
page.description: Build parts query into a URI (for inclusion in a URI).
page.example:
dim person.firstname as c = "john" dim person.lastname as c = "public"
dim urq as extension::URIQuery urq.FromJson(json_generate(person)) ? urq.BuildURIQuery() = "firstname=john&lastname=public"
